text:
All the Best Looks from the 2018 Film Independent Spirit Awards

Every product on this page was chosen by a Harper's BAZAAR editor. We may earn commission on some of the items you choose to buy.

Getty Images Last night, the biggest stars in Hollywood braved the rain to attend the 2018 Film Independent Spirit Awards in Santa Monica, California. Here are some of the best looks of the night. View Gallery 22 Photos Getty Images 1 of 22 Elizabeth Olsen In Zuhair Murad. Getty Images 2 of 22 Timothee Chalamet In Off-White and Saint Laurent sneakers. Getty Images 3 of 22 Alison Brie In Ralph & Russo. Getty Images 4 of 22 Greta Gerwig In Rosie Assoulin. Getty Images 5 of 22 Kerry Washington In Missoni. Getty Images 6 of 22 Amanda Seyfried In Alexander McQueen. Getty Images 7 of 22 Ava DuVernay In custom Greta Constantine. Getty Images 8 of 22 Salma Hayek Getty Images 9 of 22 Emily Ratajkowski In Brock Collection. Getty Images 10 of 22 Molly Shannon Getty Images 11 of 22 Saoirse Ronan In Prada. Getty Images 12 of 22 Margot Robbie In Louis Vuitton. Getty Images 13 of 22 Abigail Spencer Getty Images 14 of 22 Allison Williams In Andrew Gn. Getty Images 15 of 22 Sarah Silverman In Hottie + Lord. Getty Images 16 of 22 Aubrey Plaza In Miu Miu. Getty Images 17 of 22 Danai Gurira In Rodarte. Getty Images 18 of 22 Chadwick Boseman In Burberry. Getty Images 19 of 22 Allison Janney In custom Pamella Roland. Getty Images 20 of 22 Zoey Deutch In Christian Dior. Getty Images 21 of 22 Chloé Zhao Getty Images 22 of 22 Leslie Bibb In Sally LaPointe. Next Chrissy Teigen's Best Maternity Style Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
